jobContext: `সিদীপ` বিগত ২৮ বছর যাবৎ আর্থ সামাজিক কর্মসূচি বাস্তবায়নের মাধ্যমে টেকসই দারিদ্র বিমোচনে কাজ করে আসছে এবং প্রান্তিক মানুষের জীবন ও জীবিকার উন্নয়নে ব্রাহ্মণবাড়ীয়া, কুমিল্লা, চাঁদপুর, নোয়াখালী, লক্ষীপুর, ফেনী, চট্টগ্রাম, ঢাকা, গাজীপুর, মাদারীপুর, ফরিদপুর, শরিয়তপুর, টাঙ্গাইল, মুন্সীগঞ্জ, নারায়ণগঞ্জ, নরসিংদী, ময়মনসিংহ, সিরাজগঞ্জ, রাজশাহী, পাবনা, নাটোর, চাঁপাইনবাবগঞ্জ, কুষ্টিয়া, গোপালগঞ্জ, মানিকগঞ্জ, হবিগঞ্জ ও রাজবাড়ী জেলায় কাজ করছে। সিদীপ-এর মাইক্রোফাইন্যান্স কর্মসূচিতে গ্রামীণ পরিবেশে অবস্থান করে গ্রামীণ জনগোষ্ঠির সাথে কাজ করার মানসিকতাসম্পন্ন আগ্রহী প্রার্থীদের নিকট থেকে বর্ণিত পদে দরখাস্ত আহবান করা যাচ্ছে। উল্লেখ থাকে যে, নির্বাচিত প্রার্থীদের বাংলাদেশের যে কোন জেলায় কাজ করার মানসিকতা থাকতে হবে। তবে, নারী প্রার্থীদের ক্ষেত্রে তাদের নিজ জেলায় অথবা নিজ জেলার নিকটবর্তী সিদীপ—এর কর্মএলাকায় খালি থাকা সাপেক্ষে পোস্টিং দেয়া হবে।

jobContext:
Assessment of patients on admission.
Detailed history taking and Physical examination and documentation with in the first 24 hours of admission. Responsible for sending the patient for the appropriate investigation as directed by the primary consultant and also to authorize investigations, which are urgent.

He/ she is to complete the In-Patient rounds everyday before, and fill the case sheets and progress notes & all the necessary documents & JCI document in specific chart of medical record without fail.
Responsible for providing adequate treatment to the patient as advised and to check the dosage, frequency, route of administrations of all medications, considering all precautions.
Continually monitor and review patient progress and adjust the management plan when necessary and to take appropriate initiatives in Medical and surgical emergencies when required.
Preparation of discharge summaries well in time and briefing the patient about the medications on discharge.
Follow hospital practices and demonstrate initiative aligned to ensuring the safest possible environment for patients and staff.
To attend all clinical meetings and work shops and actively participate in paper presentations.
To be part of training programs conducted in the hospital and to take continuous initiatives for knowledge and skill up gradation.
To be involved in teaching programs that is held by the department
To oversee the activities of the Residents and guide them
To be an active member for the quality initiatives of the hospital

jobTitle: Manager / Deputy Manager - Quality Assurance Department
jobContext:
To supervise all QA activities to meet cGMP, GLP and In-house requirements.
To give final disposition (release/rejection) of materials and products in absence of Head of QA. To ensure compilation of batch documents.
To ensure release/rejection information is provided in time to all concerned departments.
To handle non-conformances of material, product and process.
To participate in determining, proposing and/or deciding and approving the necessary required actions for material/product/process non-conformances. 
To handle customer complaint, investigate the root cause and to ensure reply to the complainant.
To handle and give final approval of change control in absence of Head of QA and to conduct relevant risk assessment.
To handle and give approval to planned/unplanned deviation based on risk assessment.
To carry out and coordinate risk assessment in different functions.
To investigate out of specification test results of material and product. 
To manage sub-ordinates and ensure staff maintain good laboratory practice (GLP).
To supervise validation activities and ensure all validation activities are conducted in time.
To ensure compliance in control of documents and records.
To ensure laboratory instruments are kept in order and calibrated as per schedule.
To look after chemical and media consumption for uninterrupted QA/QC analysis.   
To carry out on time internal quality audits as per schedule.
To give approval of new supplier or reject existing supplier of material, reagent, etc. in absence of Head of QA.
To provide and coordinate training to personnel of different levels, to evaluate training and preserving training record.
To carry out any other assignments given by the authority to meet the company objectives within.
jobDescription: To supervise all QA activities to meet cGMP, GLP and In-house requirements.
educationalReq: M. Pharm/ M. Sc in Chemistry/Applied chemistry/Bio-chemistry
MBBS with BMDC full registration
